title: Tuning Your Car Engine
brief_description: Tuning your car illustrates the correct step by step procedure for tuning a conventional ignition and fuel equipped engine. The program covers : checking parts for serviceability, equipment needed, compression testing, fixing and setting new points, ignition timing, fuel pump pressure testing, air fuel mixture settings, checking battery and charging systems, and inspecting the cooling system.
